description:
Author Keigo Hiura`s assistant Chiaki Minazuki is found strangled to death in a hotel. Hiura has a perfect alibi, but Conan and Sera are certain he committed the crime. They ask about the condition of Minazuki`s room and get closer to the truth. A 20 year old postcard is discovered inside Minazuki`s suitcase. It is addressed to Hiura, and the sender is not Minazuki but Jun Ota, which is also the name of the heroine in Hiura`s "The Phone, the Ocean, and I". Later a casual remark from Takagi helps Conan and Sera realize how Hiura manipulated his alibi...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Igai na Kekka no Ren`ai Shousetsu (Kouhen)
The Romance Novel with the Unexpected Conclusion (Part 2)
النتيجة غير المُتوقعة للرواية الرُّمَنسية (الجزء الثاني)
意外な結果の恋愛小説 (後編)
